mapper.select: select ID, TITLE, CONTENT from BLOG_TBL
mapper.insert: insert into BLOG_TBL(TITLE, CONTENT) values (#{ title }, #{ content })
mapper.delete: delete from BLOG_TBL where id = #{ id }
mapper.select: select id, title, content from BLOG_TBL where title LIKE CONCAT("%", #{keyword}, "%") or content LIKE CONCAT("%", #{keyword}, "%")
